loading.payment: 플랫폼 코인 구매 시, 3~5분의 충전 지연 시간이 있을 수 있습니다. 이해해주셔서 감사합니다.

signup.title: 바로 가입
signup.password: 비밀번호를 입력하세요. 비밀번호는 영문, 숫자의 조합으로 8~20자리를 사용해야 합니다.

signup_fail.title: 잘못된 등록 정보
signup_fail.message: 회원가입 실패, 잠시 후, 다시 시도하시거나 고객센터에 문의해주시기 바랍니다.
signup_fail.message_0304: 회원가입 조작이 너무 잦습니다. 잠시 후, 다시 시도해주세요.

signup_success.title: 계정 생성 성공
signup_success.message: 계정 생성 성공, 로그인 화면으로 이동합니다.

bind_confirm.title: 게임계정 연동
bind_confirm.message: 해당 디바이스의 게임 내용은 EROLABS 계정과 XXXXXXX을 연동합니다.
bind_confirm.warning: E주의: EROLABS 계정입니다. 계정 연동은 1회만 가능합니다.

bind_fail.title: 연동 실패
bind_fail.message: 해당 EROLABS 계정은 이미 동일 게임에 연동되어 있습니다. 중복해서 연동시킬 수 없습니다.

pw_forget.title: 비밀번호 찾기
pw_forget.emailtitle: 계정 또는 인증 이메일을 입력해 주세요.

pw_forget_success.title: 재설정 메일이 발송되었습니다.
pw_forget_success.message: 재설정 메일이 발송되었습니다. 메일을 확인하여 재설정을 진행해주세요. 메일을 오지 않을 경우 입력하신 이메일 주소를 다시 확인하거나 고객센터로 문의해 주세요.

valid_fail.title: 오류
valid_fail.has_get: 이미 무료 ECoin을 수령한 내역이 있는 계정입니다.

payment.title: EROLABS | 유료 구매 플랫폼
payment.pay_info: 구매 금액 및 지불 방식을 선택하세요.
payment.info_gash: GASH POINT와 기타 결제의 충전 금액과 ECoin 획득 비율이 동일하지 않은 점을 확인 후 구매를 진행해주시기 바랍니다.
payment.pay_other_info: 기타 결제 방식 선택 시 충전 금액과 획득 ECoin 비율이 다르니 다시 한번 확인 후 구매해주시기 바랍니다.
payment.offgamers-number-tip: 아래의 방법을 통해 %{productTitle}  를 입력하고 교환하세요.
payment.offgamers-number-step1-tit: Multiple Game Card 쿠폰 번호 획득
payment.offgamers-number-method-tip: Multiple Game Card 쿠폰 번호는 Offgamers 공식 사이트에서 유료로 획득할 수 있으며 실제 결제 금액은 Offgamers를 기준으로 책정됩니다.
payment.offgamers-number-step1-tip: Offgamers 홈페이지에서 결제를 완료하면 Multiple Game Card 쿠폰 번호를 획득할 수 있습니다.
payment.offgamers-number-step2-tip1: Offgamers 홈페이지에서 획득한 쿠폰 번호를 입력해주시기 바랍니다.
payment.offgamers-number-step2-tip2: 선택한 품목보다 더 큰 금액의 쿠폰 번호를 입력해주시기 바랍니다. 만약 쿠폰 금액이 선택한 품목보다 적을 시 교환할 수 없습니다.
payment.offgamers-number-step2-tip3: 사용을 완료하지 않은 쿠폰에 남은 포인트는 남겨두고 다른 쿠폰 번호와 합쳐서 사용할 수 있습니다.
payment.offgamers-number-step2-tip4: 주의사항 - EROLABS exclusive card는 일반 Multi game card와 함께 사용할 수 없습니다.
payment.form_hint: ※결제 방식에 따라 환율 차이가 있으므로 실제 결제 금액은 최종 결제 화면에서 확인 부탁드립니다.
payment.form_hint2: ※최근 국제 환율이 변동됨에 따라  6/1 시스템 점검 후, EROLABS 플랫폼의 결제 시스템 내의 ECoin 환율이 조정됩니다. 조정이 완료된 후, 구매 시 조정된 금액을 확인할 수 있으니 구매하실 때 반드시 결제 페이지의 상세 내용을 확인해 주시기 바랍니다. 불편을 끼쳐 드려 대단히 죄송합니다. 만약  보유하고 계신 Sugoi 포인트 카드를 아직 사용하지 않으신 플레이어 여러분은 환률 변동으로 인한 손해를 방지하기 위해 점검 전에 미리 결제를 완료해주시기 바랍니다.
payment.remind: ※후속 절차 및 문제를 파악할 수 있도록 본 주문 정보를 보관하여 주십시오.
payment.faq_a1: ECoin은 EROLABS 플랫폼의 전용 가상 화폐입니다. 플레이어는 ECoin을 사용하여 EROLABS 플랫폼에 있는 모든 게임의 가상 아이템, 코인등을 구매하실 수 있습니다.
payment.faq_a2: EROLABS 공식 홈페이지에 로그인 후, 좌측 【 ECoin 포인트 구매】 페이지를 통해 구매하실 수 있습니다.
payment.faq_q3: ECoin 구매에 어떤 결제 수단을 사용할 수 있나요?
payment.faq_a3: 저희는 다양한 결제 수단을 지원합니다. 그중에는 신용카드(Visa/ Master Card/ JCB), 알리페이, 위챗페이, GASH 등이 포함되어 있습니다.
payment.faq_q4: ECoin의 잔액을 어떻게 확인할 수 있나요?
payment.faq_a4: 공식 홈페이지에 로그인 후, 개인 정보 페이지 또는 메뉴를 통해 잔액을 확인하실 수 있습니다.
payment.faq_a5: 결제하여 구매한 ECoin에 사용기한은 없습니다. 플랫폼 이벤트로 획득한 무료 추가 지급된 ECoin만 365일의 사용기한이 있으며 사용기한이 지나면 무료 추가 지급된 ECoin은 소멸되니 사용기한 안에 사용하시는 것을 권장해 드립니다.
payment.faq_a6: ECoin은 입금 후 환불이 불가능하오니 구매할 때 반드시 주문서와 구매 금액을 확인하셔야 합니다.
payment.name: 수취인 이름 :
payment.addr_enter: 종이 영수증 우편 서비스는 제공되지 않습니다.
payment.donate_9217: 재단법인 타이베이시 배려 대만 문교 재단
payment.success_no_coupon: 충전 성공, 보너스 쿠폰이 정상적으로 사용되지 않았습니다. 충전 기록에서 확인해주세요.

godvtmail_popup.title: 메일 인증
godvtmail_popup.text: 귀하의 EROLABS 계정이 아직 인증되지 않아서 무료 ECoin을 획득하실 수 없습니다. ‘인증 진행’ 버튼을 통해 인증 절차를 완료하신 후, 다시 시도해주시길 바랍니다.

footer.text: 해당 사이트에서 등장하는 모든 캐릭터는 모두 만 19세 이상입니다. 이 사이트는 선정성, 폭력성 및 공포와 관련된 내용이 포함되어 있습니다. 플레이 시간에 유의하시길 바라며 게임에 과도하게 빠지지 않도록 주의하여주시기 바랍니다. 본 게임의 일부 콘텐츠 혹은 서비스는 유료로 제공됩니다.

result.code0203: 플랫폼 계정 정보를 취득할 수 없습니다.
result.code0204: 플랫폼 주문 정보를 취득할 수 없습니다.
result.code1017: 아이디 또는 비밀번호를 잘못 입력하셨습니다. 다시 시도해 주세요.
result.code1091: 로그인 실패 1회. 입력하신 계정과 비밀번호를 확인해주세요.
result.code1092: 로그인 실패 2회. 입력하신 계정과 비밀번호를 확인해주세요.
result.code1093: 로그인 실패 3회. 입력하신 계정과 비밀번호를 확인해주세요. 로그인 시도 가능 횟수가 2회 남았습니다.
result.code1094: 로그인 실패 3회. 입력하신 계정과 비밀번호를 확인해주세요. 로그인 시도 가능 횟수가 2회 남았습니다.
result.code1095: 로그인 실패 5회. 10분 동안 해당 계정이 잠김 상태가 됩니다. 잠시 후 다시 시도해주세요.
result.code1096:
플레이어 님, 안녕하세요. 플레이어 님의 EROLABS 계정이 아직 엘리트 클로즈 베타 자격을 보유하고 있지 않은 것으로 확인되었습니다. 지금 바로 EROLABS 공식 홈페이지에서 수령하세요!
EROLABS : https://www.ero-labs.com/

result.code0402: 연동 실패. 이미 본 게임과 연동된 EROLABS 계정입니다.

result.code1399: 짧은 시간 내 여러 번의 요청이 제출되었습니다. 먼저 인증 메일을 받았는지 확인해주시기 바랍니다.

rule.title: EROLABS 계정 연동 규정
rule.rule_1: 1. EROLABS 계정은 여러 개의 [다른 게임] 계정에 연동이 가능합니다.
rule.rule_2: 2. EROLABS 계정은 [동일 게임] 계정의 연동이 1회만 가능합니다.
rule.rule_3: 3. EROLABS 계정을 연동 후 변경이 불가능합니다. 연동할 계정을 신중하게 선택하시길 바랍니다.

membership.title: EROLABS 멤버십 소개
membership.rule_1: 1. 플랫폼 공용 계정입니다. 계정 하나로 플랫폼에서 모든 게임을 즐겨보실 수 있습니다.
membership.rule_2: 2. ECoin의 통합 결제 기능을 제공합니다. 구매 한 번으로 플랫폼의 여러 게임에 지불이 가능합니다.
membership.rule_3: 3. 향후 EROLABS 플랫폼에서 제공해 드린 서비스, 향후 출시할 여러 상품을 포함하여 모두 즐길 수 있습니다.

privacy.title: PRIVACY POLICY
privacy.content_start:
EROLABS and its websites, games and other applications ('EROLABS', 'we', 'our' or 'us') believe that your privacy is very important. This Privacy Policy ('Policy') outlines the personally identifiable information and other data that we will collect from you through the websites (including official website, Facebook fan club), games and applications we provide ('Websites/Apps' or 'Services'), and how we will use and when we might disclose such information and data to third parties. Your use of these Websites/Apps and/or submission of information to us constitute your consent to this Privacy Policy and the processing of your information (personal and non-personal) as described in this Policy. Please note that the scope of this Policy is limited to information and data collected or received by EROLABS through your use of the Services. EROLABS is not responsible for the actions of third party people or companies, the content of their sites, the use of information or data you provide to them, or any products or services they may offer. Any link to those sites does not constitute our sponsorship of, or affiliation with, those people or companies.
By downloading, accessing and/or playing our games, or interacting with our websites or other Services, you are deemed to have read, completely understood and agreed to every term and every arrangement of this Policy. You shall understand that this Policy constitutes part of a legally binding contract between you and EROLABS, and if you do not accept any terms of the Policy, you shall immediately cease using any of the Services.
We are entitle to modify or amend the contents of the Policy, and inform you via push notification in the Services, sending email or in any other way we think appropriate at any time. Any modifications and amendments to this Policy shall be effective immediately upon notice to you, so we suggest you take notice of such modifications and amendments. By continuing to use the Services after the Policy has been modified or amended, it is deemed that you have read, understood and agreed to accept such modification or amendment.
If the laws of your country/region are different from the PRIVACY POLICY of EROLABS, you should STOP using EROLABS services, we only collect the information and/or data from you by our PRIVACY POLICY, and it may be different from the Personal Data Protection Act of your country/region.
IF YOU ARE A MINOR, YOU SHALL NOT USE OR CONTINUE TO USE THE SERVICES.
privacy.rule_1_content:
We may collect the following information and/or data from you:
When you register as a member of EROLABS or using our Services, we will, to confirm identity, provide member services and relevant marketing needs, collect your following information or data:
● Your contact information (such as name and email address)
● Your profile information (such as profile photo, gender, age or birthday, links to profiles on other social networking websites)
● Automatically collected data (such as IP Address, your device is operating system, browser type and language)
● Mobile device identifiers (such as your unique device ID (persistent/non-persistent, hardware type, medial access control ('MAC') address, international mobile equipment identity ('IMEI'), and your device name
● General location information for the purpose of providing you with the correct version of the application
● Precise-geo-location information from your mobile device (but only with your express consent)
● Game data (such as your interactions with the game and with the other players inside the game via server log files, your player ID)
privacy.rule_2_content: We and our marketing and outsourcing partners, affiliates, or analytics service providers use technologies such as cookies, beacons, scripts, and tags to identify a user is computer/device and to 'remember' things about your visit, such as your preferences or a user name and password.
privacy.rule_3_content:
The Services may include social media features (“Features”), such as the Facebook like button and widgets or interactive mini-programs that run on the Websites/Apps. These Features may collect your IP address, which page or part you are visiting on the Websites/Apps, and may set a cookie to enable the Feature to function properly. These Features are either hosted by a third party or hosted directly by us. Your interactions with these Features may governed by the privacy policy of the third-party company providing it.
EROLABS may offer you the opportunity to invite your contacts from a social network service (such as your Facebook friends) so that those contacts can be located in the Websites/Apps and/or you can invite them to join you in the Websites/Apps. Such contact information will be used only for the purpose of sending communications to the addressee. You or the third party may contact us to request the removal of this information from our database to the extent EROLABS stores any of this information.
We may also acquire information from you through (1) your access and participation in message boards on the Services, (2) your participation in surveys regarding the Services or (3) your participation in a sweepstakes or contest through the Services.
We may provide you the opportunity to participate in a sweepstakes or contest through the Services. If you participate, we will request certain personal information from you. Participation in these sweepstakes and contests are voluntary and you therefore have a choice whether or not to disclose your information. The requested information typically includes contact information (such as name and shipping address), and demographic information (such as zip code).
We use this information to notify winners and award prizes, to monitor traffic or personalize the Services. We may use a third-party service provider to conduct these sweepstakes or contests; that company is prohibited from using your personal information for any other purpose.
privacy.rule_4_content:
We use your information to create your account, provide Services to you, improve the Services, contact you, conduct marketing and research and create reports for internal use. We use information collected through the Services for purposes described in this Policy or disclosed to you in connection with the Services. For example, we may use your information to:
● Create game accounts and allow users to play our games;
● Identify and suggest connections with other EROLABS users;
● Operate and improve the Services;
● enhance your experience and enjoyment using the Services;
● Provide customer service;
● Provide and deliver products and services you request;
● Deliver advertising and marketing and promotional information to you;
● Send related information, including confirmations, invoices, technical notices, updates, security alerts, and support and administrative messages to you;
● Enable you to communicate with other users;

Website Services

While you are browsing our websites (“Sites”), the operating system of your computers/devices, Internet Protocol (IP) address, access times, browser type and language and referring Sites addresses may be logged automatically. We may use this information to monitor, develop and analyze your use of the Services.
We may ask you to submit and we may process data that is personal to you, including but not limited to your name, profile photo, gender, age or birthday, links to your profiles on social networking websites and other third party sites, user names and e-mail and mail addresses. We may use this information to create a user profile and provide you Services.

Forums and Private Messages

Our Sites offer publicly accessible blogs, private messages, or community forums. You should be aware that any information you provide in these areas may be read, collected, and used by others who access them. To request removal of your personal information from our blog or community forum, please contact us. In some cases, we may not be able to remove your personal information, in which case we will let you know if we are unable to do so and why.

Customer Service

We may use your email address to contact you about your gaming experience with EROLABS games and notify you about company news and promotions.
If you no longer wish to receive certain email notifications you may opt-out at any time by following the unsubscribe link located at the bottom of each communication or by emailing us with the contact information provided in this policy.
Your mailing address may be used if we have merchandise or other physical promotional materials that we want to send to you. If you no longer wish to receive these types of promotional materials, you may opt-out from receiving them at any time by emailing us with the contact information provided in this policy.

Third Party Services

The Services may contain third party tracking and data collection and analytics tools from the Services providers, examples of which include Google Analytics and Mobile App Tracking by Tune. Such third parties may use cookies, APIs, and SDKs in the Services to enable them to collect and analyze user and device related data and information on our behalf. The third parties may have access to and collect data and information about you, such as your device identifier, MAC address, IMEI, locale (specific location where a given language is spoken), geo-location information, IP address, application usage, access and session times, applications present on the device or in use at a particular time on the device, and your viewing of and interactions with advertising, for the purpose of providing their services, including, for example, enabling, providing and delivering advertising as described in further detail below..
The privacy policies of the Services providers may include additional terms and disclosures regarding their data collection and use practices and tracking technologies, and we encourage you to check those privacy policies to learn more about their data collection and use practices, use of cookies and other similar tracking technologies.
privacy.rule_5_content:
When you use any of the EROLABS games or applications on a mobile platform, we may record certain information and data. This information is useful to us for troubleshooting and helps us understand usage trends and improve and optimize the Services and your user experience, and may also be utilized for other purposes, such as interest-based advertising as described elsewhere in this Policy.
In addition, we create a unique user ID to track your use of the Services. This unique user ID is stored in connection with your profile information to track the EROLABS games you are playing.
We may occasionally send you push notifications through our mobile applications to send you game updates, high scores and other service related notifications that may be of importance to you. You may at any time opt-out from receiving these types of communications by turning them off at the device level through your settings.
With only your express consent, we or our partners may collect your precise location based information (GPS) for the purpose of matching you with opponent players in your local area, to tailor content specific to your area (such as event announcements), to show your location to other players, and to match your device location to certain points of interest for purposes of interest based advertising as described elsewhere in this Policy. Other players in our game may then be able to see that you are available to play a game when you participate in specific areas of our games. Please note, participation in this part of the Services is not a requirement for all game play in our games, but it may be a requirement with others in your area.
privacy.rule_6_content:
We may feature advertisements in our games and elsewhere, both ourselves and with the help of our partners, and collect and use data and information about you and your device (including the presence of applications on the device or in use at a particular time on the device) in connection with such advertising, including your viewing of and interaction with any such advertising, in order to deliver, enable, target and optimize advertising and promotional information that is more relevant to you and is based on your game and device usage, online behavior and interests (this is commonly referred to as online behavioral or interest based advertising).
Advertisers on mobile devices and our third party advertising and analytics partners sometimes collect and use advertising IDs to enable and optimize advertising. advertising IDs are non-permanent device identifiers such as the Android advertising ID and/or Apple is ID for advertising.
These advertisers and third party advertising and analytics partners may collect and use data and information about you, such as the Services session activity, viewing of and interaction with an advertisement, device identifier, MAC address, IMEI, geo-location information and IP address for the purposes of analyzing, tracking and measuring advertisement performance and to provide interest based advertising.
In addition, you may see our games advertised in other services. After clicking on one of these advertisements and installing our game, you will become a user of the Services. In order to verify the installs, a device identifier may be shared with the advertiser or third party advertiser or analytics partner.
privacy.rule_7: Disclosure of the Personal Information That We Collect
privacy.rule_7_content:
● Unless otherwise agreed by you, we will not sell, rent or transfer your personal information to third parties without your prior consent.
● It may be necessary − by law, legal process, litigation, and/or requests from public and governmental authorities within or outside your country of residence − for EROLABS to disclose your personal information or other information collected by us. We may also disclose information about you if we determine that for purposes of national security, law enforcement, or other issues of public importance, disclosure is necessary or appropriate.
● In connection with any sale of our company or any line of business (including the assets relating thereto), customer information generally is one of the transferred business assets, and such customer information (including your Personal Information) will be transferred or sold to the acquirer in the event of any such sale or disposition of any or all of our business.
privacy.rule_8_content:
We ask that you keep the personal information that you provide to us current. You represent and warrant that all personal information you provide us is true and correct and relates to you and not to any other person.
If you wish to review, delete and/or revise the personal information we have stored about you, please contact us with your specific request at the Services email.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for restricting access to your computer or device, and you agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account. We will not be liable for any losses due to account information leakage or unauthorized access (including but not limited to installed spyware, being hacked, not logged out of the Services after use or failure to keep the security of a registered device) that is attributable to your negligence.
privacy.rule_9_content: Our Websites/Apps may link to external sites beyond our control. This Policy covers only the way we treat the personal information we collect on our Websites/Apps. By accessing any external sites, you are agreeing to the privacy policies of those sites. Please understand that the external sites may have different policies with respect to the collection, use and disclosure of your Personal Information. We have no control over and are not responsible for the privacy practices of such third parties. Therefore, you are encouraged to review the privacy policies of all third-party Websites/Apps. Without limiting anything in the following section, we are not liable in any way for the actions, inactions or policies of any external services.
privacy.rule_10_content:
IF YOU ARE A MINOR, YOU SHALL NOT USE OR CONTINUE TO USE THE SERVICES.
We do not knowingly collect or solicit personal information from or direct or target interest based advertising to anyone under the age of 18 or knowingly allow such persons to use the Services. If you are under 18, please do not send any information about yourself to us, including your name, address, telephone number, or email address. No one under the age of 18 may provide any personal information. In the event that we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under age 18, we will delete that information as quickly as possible. If you are a parent or guardian who has discovered or suspected that your child under the age of 18 has submitted his or her personally identifiable information without your permission or consent, please contact us by e-mail and we will make reasonable efforts to remove the information from our database.
All models appearing on this website are 18 years or older.
privacy.rule_11_content: It is entirely your choice whether or not you provide personal information to us. We have put in place physical, electronic, and managerial procedures to attempt to safeguard and help prevent unauthorized access, maintain data security, and correctly use the personal information collected through the Websites/Apps. We take reasonable precautions to protect our customers is personal information against loss, misuse, unauthorized disclosure, alteration, and destruction. However, please remember that no transmission of data over the internet or any wireless network can be guaranteed to be 100% secure. As a result, while we strive to protect your personal information, we cannot ensure or warrant the security of any information that you transmit to us or from us, and you do so at your own risk. Please notify us immediately if you find out any actual or suspected breach or unauthorized access or use of your account.
privacy.rule_12_content: If you want to contact us about any of the matters in relation to this privacy policy, including to exercise any of your rights, then please contact our customer services department.

ecoin.title: ECoin Terms of Service
ecoin.rule_1_content:
1) The ECoin (hereinafter referred to as the "ECoin") used to make purchases within EROLABS工口実験室. You shall only purchase ECoin from the EROLABS (hereinafter referred to as "EROLABS").
2) The Terms of Service and Privacy Policy shall also form part of this agreement.
3) By using ECoin Terms of Service, you are deemed to have read this agreement carefully and agreed to be bound by this agreement. If you do not agree, do not use ECoin services.
4) IF YOU ARE A MINOR, YOU SHALL NOT USE OR CONTINUE TO USE THE SERVICES.
5) If the laws of your country/region are different from the ECoin Terms of Service, you should stop using ECoin services. EROLABS is not responsible for the laws in your country/region.
6) We reserves the right, at its discretion, to change, modify, add or remove any portion of these terms, its ECoin Terms of Service and other relevant policies developed by us (collectively as "Policies")at any time by posting the amended terms on the ECoin Terms of Service. You will be deemed to have accepted such changes by continuing to use the Service. If at any point you do not agree to any portion of the then-current version of Policies, rules or codes of conduct relating to your use of ECoin Terms of Service, you must immediately stop using ECoin Services.
ecoin.rule_2_content:
1) Users shall purchase and counting ECoin by the rules established by the EROLABS.
2) EROLABS only sells ECoin on the 『EROLABS 工口実験室』 operated by the EROLABS. Any other ECoin obtained through other channels is null and void with the EROLABS, nor can it be used in the "EROLABS工口実験室".
ecoin.rule_3_content:
1) EROLABS could provide users with a free ECoin, and the term and conditions of the free ECoin will be sole determined by EROLABS.
2) The free ECoin cannot be refunded, transferred or converted into cash or any valuables.
3) If there are both ECoin and free ECoin in the user account, ECoin will be deducted first when the user uses, and then the free ECoin will be deducted when exhausted all ECoin.
4) The free ECoin will expire after 365 days from the next day after purchase.The user should use the ECoin within the expiration date; ECoin will become invalid after the expiration date.
ecoin.rule_4_content:
1) When purchase ECoin, users must choose carefully, confirm the items to be purchased, the item you need, and the corresponding amount, because ECoin will take effect immediately after purchase, ECoin is NON-REFUNDABLE.
2) Users should use the ECoin in their account carefully, EROLABS will not reissue ECoin for any reason.
ecoin.rule_5_content:
1) In the event of maintenance/inspection of the ECoin management system, failure, natural disasters, communication line failure or other reasons, EROLABS may suspend the use of ECoin without prior notice to the user.
2) EROLABS shall be able to suspend the use of ECoin or revoke ECoin if any of the following items apply.
  1. When the user acquires ECoin by an illegal method or ECoin are acquired by an illegal method and uses it.
  2. When the user violates this agreement.
  3. When the ECoin are forged or altered.
  4. EROLABS may sole determines stop using ECoin by reasonable reason.
  5. EROLABS shall be able to issue or terminate the use of ECoin due to changes in social conditions, revision or abolition of laws and regulations, or unavoidable reasons.
ecoin.rule_6_content: The user shall not to transfer, lend, or pledge ECoin to another person in any way.
ecoin.rule_7_content: EROLABS shall not be liable for any damage or disadvantage caused to the user due to the inability to use ECoin. However, this shall not apply if the damage or disadvantage is based on the intentional of the EROLABS.
ecoin.rule_8_content: If EROLABS deems it is necessary to change the ECoin Terms of Service, it will change it through the website or other methods. After the change, the ECoin Terms of Service will take effect immediately, and users should check the changes to the terms of service from time to time.
ecoin.rule_9_content:
This Agreement contain the entire understanding and agreement among you and EROLABS with respect to the subject matter hereof and supersede and cancel any and all prior oral and written agreements, terms and conditions.

This Agreement shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of EROLABS assigns. Any dispute, controversy, difference or claim arising out of, relating to or in connection with this Agreement, or the breach, termination or invalidity thereof, shall be finally settled by arbitration referred to EROLABS assigns.

If we fail to exercise or perform any of right or provision under the terms of this Agreement, this will not constitute a waiver of executing such rights or provision.

If any court or competent authority decides that any of the provisions of this Agreement are invalid, unlawful or unenforceable to any extent, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.

If you have any questions about any terms of this Agreement or EROLABS Services you may contact us.

qrcode.title: ●WeChat 페이를 사용하여 결제해주시기 바랍니다.
qrcode.msg:
1. QR 코드 이미지를 길게 누르거나 화면 캡처 기능으로 이미지를 사진 앨범에 저장합니다.
2. WeChat을 실행한 후, 『검색』의 QR 코드 스캔 기능을 실행합니다.
3. 『스캔』 기능 중 『앨범』을 실행하고 저장했던 QR 코드 이미지를 선택합니다.
4. 금액을 확인한 후, 안내에 따라 결제를 진행합니다.
qrcode.footer:
※ 결제가 성공적으로 완료된 후, QR 코드 페이지가 새로 고침 되지 않으면 처음 화면으로 돌아가 ECoin이 추가됐는지 확인해주시기 바랍니다.
※ QR 코드 이미지는 중복으로 결제할 수 없으며 한 번만 사용할 수 있는 점에 유의해주시기 바랍니다
qrcode.text: 모바일 기기를 통해 QR코드 결제 시 , 다른 모바일 기기로 스캔해서 결제를 진행할 수 있습니다.
qrcode.msg_AliPay:
1. QR코드 이미지를 길게 누르거나 화면 캡처 기능으로 이미지를 사진 앨범에 저장합니다.
2. 알리페이를 실행한 후, QR 코드 스캔 기능을 실행합니다.
3. 스캔 기능 인터페이스 중 사진 앨범을 실행하고 저장했던 QR 코드 이미지를 선택합니다.
4. QR 코드 스캔 기능을 실행하여 결제를 진행합니다.
qrcode.footer_AliPay:
※ 결제가 성공적으로 완료된 후, QR 코드 페이지가 새로 고침 되지 않으면 처음 화면으로 돌아가 포인트가 추가됐는지 확인해주시기 바랍니다.
※ QR 코드 이미지는 중복으로 결제할 수 없으며 한 번만 사용할 수 있는 점에 유의해주시기 바랍니다.

subscription.title: 회원 구독 서비스
subscription.content_start: 「회원+」로 승급 시 등급 유지 특권 획득 가능
